Speaker.Message: I am The Great Oracle! I see all! I hear all! I know all! No evil can slip past my eye.
Come hither, master wizard, and let me bestow upon you great knowledge that I have foreseen.
I, The Great Oracle, have seen a future with a very grave outcome.
The enemy has thought they could slip past my eternal gaze, but they are wrong!
With my almighty powers, I will grant you the knowledge to smite your foes with great ease.
